title: Error feedback when applying LSTM on input of wrong size
body_html:
Applying LSTM (not sure if this is the issue with other modules) on input of wrong size does not give proper feedback. For example, the following code

import torch
import torch.autograd as autograd
import torch.nn as nn

lstm = nn.LSTM(3, 2)
hidden = (autograd.Variable(torch.zeros(3, 2)), autograd.Variable(torch.zeros(3, 2)))
input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(6, 4, 5))
lstm(input, hidden)

raises NameError: name 'fn' is not defined. It would be better if we received an error that says "expected this, got that" as it would help us debug the code. May I kindly ask you to have a look? Thanks.

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(6, 4, 5))
lstm(input, hidden)
